WorkItem.Description:
Issue- (crash report below) Rawr crashes when viewing trinket slot 1 on DKDPS.  All other slots work as intended.  Doesn't appear to affect DKTank module.
 
To duplicate:  Load attached character save.  Using drop-down box above comparison window select Slot:Gear>Trinket 1
 
Crash Report:
 
Description:
  Stopped working
 
Problem signature:
  Problem Event Name:	CLR20r3
  Problem Signature 01:	rawr.exe
  Problem Signature 02:	2.3.21.0
  Problem Signature 03:	4c5602a5
  Problem Signature 04:	Rawr.Base
  Problem Signature 05:	2.3.21.0
  Problem Signature 06:	4c560298
  Problem Signature 07:	6b
  Problem Signature 08:	135
  Problem Signature 09:	System.IndexOutOfRangeException
  OS Version:	6.0.6002.2.2.0.256.1
  Locale ID:	1033

Comments.Message: Cannot reproduce.  Please provide more information.
When there's a CLR20xx type error, it's a bad .NET load on your system, not our code. Please reinstall the appropriate .NET for your system.

Removed all versions of .net and reinstalled the latest version from Microsoft (v4).  Problem persists.  Also loaded same character from armory and had the same issues.  When I loaded from the armory I switched into dkdps module and was able to view the trinket list on the right hand pane.  I then began switching out the gear, from tank to dps, one piece at a time.  It wasn't until I switched out the trinket slot that the program crashed.

Just downloaded a fresh copy of rawr onto my pc and have loaded the dpsdk module.  Everything appears to be working as intended.  Trinkets are accessible and viewable.  I'll post any other related issues here if I come across them.  Thanks again to the dev team for your time on this awesome project!

Not sure if this link is related or even helpful but...http://runtingsproper.blogspot.com/2010/02/solved-error-1053-eventtype-clr20r3.html
